definition: The first month of the year, typically associated with new beginnings, resolutions, and the start of a fresh calendar year. It is commonly used to refer to the period following December and preceding February.

examples.german: Januar ist der erste Monat des Jahres.
examples.english: January is the first month of the year.

examples.german: Im Januar ist es oft kalt und schneereich.
examples.english: In January, it is often cold and snowy.

examples.german: Der Januar ist nach dem r√∂mischen Gott Janus benannt.
examples.english: January is named after the Roman god Janus.
